text: Ashley Henley (May 17, 1981 â€“ June 13, 2021) was an American teacher and politician. She was a member of the Mississippi House of Representatives from the 40th district from 2016 to 2020. She was a member of the Republican Party. Henley taught in the DeSoto County School District for 13 years. She also taught American history at Northwest Mississippi Community College. On June 13, 2021, Henley was shot and killed in Water Valley, Mississippi, close to a trailer where her sister-in-law's burned body was found in December 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1981 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American murder victims Category:American teachers Category:21st- century American politicians Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Mississippi Category:Educators from Mississippi
title: Ashley Henley
